answer: BMI calculate karan layi weight te height chahidi hundi hai. Form fill karo te submit karo.
Zyada steps walk karo, pani wadh piya karo te balanced diet rakho.
PDF report download karan layi upar 'Download Report' button te click karo.
Email ch report paun layi 'Email Result' button use karo te email enter karo.
Sahi neend layi 7-8 ghante rozana sona zaroori hai.
Rozana kam az kam 2-3 liters pani piya karo.
Stress ghataun layi meditation, walk, te deep breathing exercises karo.
Rozana 30 minute exercise ya walk karna tandrusti layi faidemand hai.
Smoking bilkul chhaddo, eh sehat nu bahut nuksan pohcha sakda hai.
Alcohol consumption nu limit rakho ya avoid karo for better health.
Balanced diet rakho jisme vegetables, fruits, protein, te whole grains hon.
Rozana kam az kam 8000-10000 steps walk karna sehatmand hai.
Healthy heart layi regular cardio exercise te low salt diet follow karo.
Blood sugar control layi sugary foods limit karo te exercise zaroori hai.
Cholesterol control layi oily foods kam karo te fiber-rich diet rakho.
Mental health layi meditation, hobbies, te positive thinking zaroori hai.
Healthy weight layi diet control te regular exercise follow karo.
Immunity boost layi vitamin C, fruits, vegetables, te proper sleep zaroori hai.
Form fill karo, submit karo, result dekho, te tips follow karo. PDF download ya email kar sakde ho.
Prediction confidence percentage nal dikhaya jaega, jinna zyada score, ohna accurate result.
Page reload karo ya form dobara fill karo to get new prediction.
Language change karan layi top right corner te available options use karo.
Koi issue aave ta contact support ya chat feature use karo for help.
App health prediction layi user inputs le ke ML model run karda hai, te personalized tips provide karda hai.
Har input feature layi SHAP value dikhayi jaandi hai jo risk increase ya decrease indicate kardi hai.
Prediction tuhade health risk score nu show karda hai, jithe high score matlab higher risk.
Health improve karan layi healthy diet, regular exercise, neend, hydration te stress management follow karo.
Daily reminders layi apne phone ya calendar te set karo for exercise, hydration, te sleep.
